channel.title: (name needed) (Blue Dragon Support)
channel.description:
> (name needed) Blue Dragon Support > > Passive: Immune to occupation and redirection > > Night Ability: All visitors to your target will target you instead. People who target you this way cannot kill or convert you.
> (name needed) Unseen Support > > Passive: Immune to occupation and redirection > > Night Ability: All visitors to your target will target you instead. People who target you this way cannot kill or convert you.
Basically Debauches all visitors to your target. Based off Drunk.

item.title: (name needed) (Blue Dragon Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Huh, odd. It doesn’t seem to fit with Drunk though, since Drunk is an Offensive class, and the Supports are usually the ones to protect people (CW, Phys, Mercenary).

Read full topic

item.description:
No, Alan is right. This was an old ability that the Drunk had that was scrapped. I don’t remember why though.

Read full topic

item.title: (name needed) (Blue Dragon Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Not exactly. It’s a more defensive form, so you don’t actually debauch your target. Just all their visitors (besides you).

item.title: (name needed) (Blue Dragon Support)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
(name needed) Blue Dragon Support

Passive: Immune to occupation and redirection

Night Ability: All visitors to your target will target you instead. People who target you this way cannot kill or convert you.

(name needed) Unseen Support

Passive: Immune to occupation and redirection

Night Ability: All visitors to your target will target you instead. People who target you this way cannot kill or convert you.

Basically Debauches all visitors to your target. Based off Drunk.

Read full topic
